code: import axios from"axios";var axiosRequest=function axiosRequest(requestType,appendUrl,payload){var baseUrl="https://beamadmin.herokuapp.com";var requestUrl="".concat(baseUrl).concat(appendUrl);var config;config={headers:{"Content-type":"Application/json"}};var axiosGet=function axiosGet(){return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){axios.get(requestUrl).then(function(res){resolve(res);}).catch(function(error){reject(error);});});};var axiosPost=function axiosPost(){return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){axios.post(requestUrl,payload,config).then(function(res){resolve(res);}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);reject(error);});});};var axiosPut=function axiosPut(){return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){axios.put(requestUrl,payload,config).then(function(res){resolve(res);}).catch(function(error){reject(error);});});};switch(requestType.toLowerCase()){case"post":return axiosPost();case"get":return axiosGet();case"put":return axiosPut();default:break;}};export default axiosRequest;
